testimonials.desc: Worked with Nicolas on various projects at Google's Applied Machine Learning Intensive. I was impressed with his positive outlook /can-do attitude towards problems encountered while working on projects. He is a great person to work with and brings amazing energy to a team.
testimonials.author: Marc Mascarenhas

testimonials.desc: Driven is the phrase that comes to mind when I think about Nicolas. I've had the pleasure of knowing Nicolas for 3 months, during which we studied and worked together on various coding projects. Above all, I was impressed with Nicolas's understanding of Statistics and strong coding skills in Python. Nicolas would be a true asset for any positions requiring Python and Data Analysis and comes with my heartfelt recommendation.
testimonials.author: Michael LeJeune Hu
